title: Idyllic Grenada Six Senses Oceanfront Wellness Retreat with Opulent Spa
description:
Immerse yourself in total Caribbean luxury at Six Senses La Sagesse, surrounded by breathtaking views over the Atlantic, dramatic cliffs and lush tropical vegetation. This stunning retreat, perched on the south-east edge of Grenada, offers unparalleled relaxation and exclusivity. Explore the vibrant underwater world with a snorkelling adventure, indulge in the freshest seafood, or simply relax with a delicious cocktail in hand at Panquai.

Spend days discovering the nearby historic Fort Frederick and the bustling St. George's Market Square, indulge in a Caribbean Cleansing Ritual at the opulent Six Senses Spa, or share in an incredible local seafood dining experience from the raw bar and wood fire grill at SeaFire.
